description.en:
SYFIN features industry leading Defi Reflect Code in our smart contracts.

We have a team that has built our SYF NFT platform on the Fantom network where users can mint/buy/sell NFT's using $SYF. By using SYFIN users can see upwards of 99.8% in mint cost reduction.

SYFIN also features what we call a dividend tax, Users who hold 200,000 $SYF will automatically earn $BOO, which is deposited every hour!
